title: hehe
content:
It looks maybe a little like XkyKeen. But I think you guys are really missing the point (and kinda insulting AllStories) by doing nothing but point that out.

I really like the picture, AllStories! :-) I appreciate all the detail you put into Keen's helmet and his clothes. That's a huge difference between your style and XkyKeen style... I never put pocket lines, dents'n'scratches, or collar wrinkles; my style is much more minimalist.

It looks like it's meant to be a movie poster--or some sort of teaser for a project you are (were?) working on. Is there more to this, or is it a one-shot? :-)

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/posted-pics/XkyRauhKeenLogo.png[/img]

title: That's not what I meant!!!
content:
I didn't mean it as an insult; rather as praise. It looks sooo cute [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] !!!

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: That's not what I meant!!!
content:
Great drawing.

PS: It says "All or you bread deserve to die"... Are you fluent in English?~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Eh?
content:
[hr]LordOfGlobox PS: It says "All or you bread deserve to die"... Are you fluent in English?
[hr]Actually, it says, "All your bread are deserve to die", a parody of "All your base are belong to us".Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

The development of the hardware, and the greater ability to express every idea that flies into a programmers head, mean that game creators have made the new games congested with every technique in their power. The basic games behind all this are so blurred that people cant catch up. We should go back to basics like Pac-Man and play in an easier, more relaxed way. -Toru Iwatani

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: Eh?

(I really wasn't paying attention before.)
I wonder how that would work in the games.Retodon8
